TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LicenseManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供属性和方法，用以将许可证添加到组件和管理 。

span.span: Provides properties and methods to add a license to a component and to manage a .
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供以下`static`属性: 和。 The class provides the following `static` properties: and . 类`static`还提供以下方法: 、 和。The class also provides the following `static` methods: , , and . 创建要许可的组件时, 必须执行以下操作:When you create a component that you want to license, you must do the following: 1. 通过使用标记组件来指定。 Specify the by marking the component with a . 2. 在组件的构造函数中调用或。Call or in the constructor of the component. 当尝试创建没有有效许可证的实例时, 将引发。 throws a when it tries to create an instance without a valid license. 不引发异常。 does not throw an exception. 3. 在释放或完成组件时授予的任何许可证上调用。Call on any license that is granted when the component is disposed or finalized. 有关授权的详细信息, 请[参阅如何:许可证组件和控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e66c1ed-a445-4b26-8185-990b6e2bbd57)。For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e66c1ed-a445-4b26-8185-990b6e2bbd57). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法创建授权控件。The following code example creates a licensed control using the method. 它使用 由类实现的。It uses a that is implemented by the class. [!code-cpp[Classic LicenseManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic LicenseManager Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic LicenseManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic LicenseManager Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic LicenseManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic LicenseManager Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

An instance of the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定 为参数的将用作此的生存期的。 `creationContext`The you specify as the `creationContext` parameter is used as the for the life of this . 方法阻止修改 中的所有其他线程,从而允许作为原子操作。 The method blocks all other threads in the from modifying the , allowing to behave as an atomic operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定 为参数的将用作此的生存期的。 `creationContext`The you specify as the `creationContext` parameter is used as the for the life of this . 此方法阻止 修改中的所有其他线程, 从而允许作为原子操作。This method blocks all other threads in the from modifying the , allowing to behave as an atomic operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在`type`参数未获得许可时返回`license` , 或在获得许可且参数有效时返回`true`。 The method returns `true` when the `type` parameter is not licensed, or when it is licensed and the `license` parameter is valid. 如果此方法无法授予有效 的, 则不会引发。This method does not throw a when it cannot grant a valid . 方法引发异常。The method throws exceptions. 如果此调用后`null` 参数不为, 则请求 a 的对象必须在释放或完成对象时通过调用方法来释放许可证。 `license`If the `license` parameter is not `null` after this call, the object asking for a must dispose of the license by calling the method when the object is disposed of or finalized.
